    <descript>
      <abstract>A polygon file that represents the boundary of East and West Germany during the cold war period.  </abstract>
      <purpose>It was digitized based on a scanned boundary map that shows East and West Germany during the cold war period using ArcMap.   The purpose is to support faculty and students who need this boundary map for their research and teaching.
</purpose>
    </descript>

    <lineage>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>A scanned image of the boundary between East and West Germany in the cold war period (1945---1990) was georeferenced and drawed a  boundary between East and West Germany against a reference German boundary file (shape file) using ArcMap to create a line vector file.  Using a buffer tool to make this line as a polygon file for a boundary between East and West Germany.   This newly created  polygon was merged with the existing Germany boundary file to make a new East and West German Boundary file.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2021</procdate>
      </procstep>
    </lineage>
  </dataqual>
